name: .RSCOLLECTION File Extension
summary: Learn about .RSCOLLECTION files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: To use an RSCOLLECTION file to download files via RetroShare, you must:
Right-click the file and select Open File.
When the Collection Editor window appears, select Download!.
At this point, the files your RSCOLLECTION describes will begin downloading in RetroShare.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
